page.title: 08RECREATION
page.content: Along the shore line is part of the Solent Way. This is a major leisure footpath which follows the eastern 61 miles of Hampshire's interesting coastline, from Milford-on-Sea in the west to Emsworth at the eastern border with West Sussex. Along the Gosport coastline the route clings to the beach from Lee-on-Solent to Gilkicker Point and is waymarked with distinctive blue signposts. A matter of few yards from the beach at Stokes Bay is Stanley Park creating an entirely different world with its slender trees and ornamental gardens. The Alverbank Hotel provides food and accomodation on the edge of Stanley Park and there are several ice cream kiosks which are only open in the summer season.
